=== Overview ===
We have informal meetings via IRC every week on Thursday at 7:00 PM EDT on chat.freenode.net at #ubuntu-us-sc and formal meetings on the last Wednesday of every month at 8:00 P.M. EST (see official Ubuntu S.C. Google Calendar for reminders and/or information).

You can join in and see what we are all about by using your favorite IRC Client or by going to our <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntusc.com/Chat/|Website]]</nowiki> and you can join in without installing anything!

Here you can view our past meeting logs and see the agendas and dates of our future meetings.
